project_abstract.cdata: The Second Highway Project will involve: construction of a 158 km all-weather surfaced highway from Hargeisa to Berbera and consulting services for, (i) assistance in the prequalification of contractors, evaluation of contract bids and the award of contract for the civil works; (ii) supervision of construction; (iii) preparation of a feasibility study and, if it confirms the technical and economic feasibility, subsequent detailed engineering of the Hargeisa-Borama highway (about 140 km) with a spur to Tug Wajale (about 20 km); and (iv) technical assistance in transport planning.
